descriptionHtml:
NOTE: So I can push out updates quickly, this mod is only available in the Steam Workshop for the time being. Click the Mirrors tab to access its page.

Become a culinary champion! Adds 7 new recipes to the cook pot, with more to come!

This mod adds 5 original recipes to the cooking pot:

* Apple squash soup
* Special apple pie (with a special sugary twist! Don\'t tell your parents)
* Dog soup
* Rabbit stew
* Seafood pie
* Pheasant stew

And adds the ability to create two more kinds of food:

* Baked potatoes
* Apple pie

Each recipe has been meticulously researched for nutritional content, and each new item\'s stats reflect that research.

But that\'s not all. Subscribe to this mod now and get the latest recipes when they\'re done!
author: Shrewsbury

files.name: Go to the Mirrors tab to download this mod
